updates.description: Added smooth animation on serie segregation
Added donut smooth animation on serie segregation
Fixed errors when a daatapoint has a 0 value
Removed janky animation on side zoom. A smoother animation is in the works.
Fixed issues in fullscreen mode (tooltip & legend not visible)
Added time label rotation config option
Added time label rotation config option
Fixed Safari css problems affecting legend labels
Added #dataLabel scoped slot to enable custom data labels.
Name colors are now accepeted in configs and datasets
Fixed a bug when no colors are provided in dataset and animation is activated
Added serie segregation when selecting a legend item
Added giftWrap plot config option to display the max area occupied by dataset's plots
Fixed blur effect not working on Safari
Fixed blur effect not working on Safari
Fixed blur effect not working on Safari
Improved gradient implementation so it works on dark backgrounds.
Added dataset value.weight option to make a bubble chart.
Added the #cell scoped slot for custom cell contents.
Added the 'breakdown 'dataset option that will display donuts in the legend in stack mode.
Added stack mode through a new 'series' dataset option
Improvement allowing to select datapoints located below dataLabels
Improved component resilience when dataset is undefined or empty, and showing a skeleton.
Added config options to control chart width and dataLabel display
Added exposed data in #tooltip-before & #tooltip-after scoped slots
Added config options to control the animation of the tooltip bar charts
Added config options to control sparkline animations
Fixed edge case bug on serie segregation when data labels are enabled
Added universal component 'VueDataUi', which can be used instead of individual components, by specifying the component name in the props.
Added missing prefix & suffix on parent category labels
Improved safeguards when value is higher than max or lower than min
Added config option 'caption' to display series info directly onto the chart only in horizontal mode (default)
Added optional display of donut names
Fixed tooltip issues when gradient is enabled
Added offsetY option to serie titles
Fixed bottom legend label colors not applied
Fixed edge case breaking the chart when data is not ready and slider option is used
Redesigned legend in bottom position to have same style as right position
Fixed minor axis issue when all values were positive and > 0
Improvements to bar labels options, to display abbreviated serie names
Added customizable tooltips for all charts bearing tooltip config options.
Fixed a bug causing negative datapoints overflow in auto mode
Fixed a bug introduced in previous release
Added optional display of data table with sparklines
Fixed viewBox size issues ocurring with small datasets
Added dynamic indicator on side legend showing on cell hover
Fixed y position of multiple series parent label
Added getVueDataUi config utility function to get the template of the config object for any component
Added prefix & suffix data label options
Added prefix & suffix data label options
Added prefix & suffix data label options
Added prefix & suffix data label options
Added prefix & suffix data label options
Added prefix & suffix data label options
Added prefix & suffix data label options
When showOnlyFirstAndLast is true, show any xLabel on hover
Create component that can be injected into #svg slots
Improved data tables and added exposed css classes
Improved data tables and added exposed css classes
Improved data tables and added exposed css classes
Improved data tables and added exposed css classes
Improved table options, layout and responsiveness
Improved table options, layout and responsiveness
Improved table options, layout and responsiveness
Improved table options, layout and responsiveness
Improved table options, layout and responsiveness
Improved table options, layout and responsiveness
Improved table options, layout and responsiveness
Improved table options, layout and responsiveness
Improved table options, layout and responsiveness
Improved table options, layout and responsiveness
Improved table options, layout and responsiveness
Improved table options, layout and responsiveness
Improved arcs design to allow a border
Removed XLSX dependency, which had unfixable vulnerabilities. Now exports will generate csv files.
Added a #svg slot in most chart components, enabling customized svg extensions.
Use unique ids instead of Math.random
Added icons for all chart types
Add offsetY config option to value label
New design for user options menu
Fix flex layout in table first col
On serie select, dataLabel takes the color of the highlighted series
For plot and line types, add shapes dataset option
Improve tooltip content with inline bar charts
Add selected shape in tooltip. Fix legend issue in print render.
Slightly increase datapoint shapes size on hover
Fix highlight area label not showing in Firefox
Add png image download option and exposed generateImage method
Add png image download option and exposed generateImage method
Add png image download option and exposed generateImage method
Add png image download option and exposed generateImage method
Add png image download option and exposed generateImage method

Add png image download option and exposed generateImage method
Add png image download option and exposed generateImage method
Add png image download option and exposed generateImage method
Add highlight area in canvas mode
Prevent highlight area side overflow when using zoom
Minor code cleanup after component e2e test implemented
Add smooth curve dataset option to line types in SVG mode.

updates.component: VueUiXy, VueUiDonut, VueUiRadar, VueUiQuadrant, VueUiOnion, VueUiVerticalBar, VueUiScatter, VueUiCandlestick

updates.description: Add dataset option to display a line type as an area.
Add the useCanvas option to display the chart as a canvas. This is an experimental feature.
Add smiley option in skeleton rating type
Update vue-data-ui.d.ts types. Now config types are optional.
Add smooth animations on some charts
Fix undefined displayed in data labels if no prefix or suffix
Add config option to position legend on top or bottom
Fix error when zoom is deactivated; fix tootlip default bg color
Replace unicode icons by svg elements in most charts
Fix progression line crash when filtering period range to an empty set.
Fix x dataLabels centering offset on bar type
In post mode, add createdAt timestamp and fileSize
Add progression line & serie tag dataset options
Add dahsed option for line types
Fix table not opening from options
Add sorting direction to config & options
Fix non closing polygon in Firefox
Allow RGB, HSL color formats in config & datasets
Fix dataLabels on y axis not showing if min value > 0
Add 'showOnlyFirstAndLast' config option to show only first and last time labels on x axis. vue-data-ui is opinionated and chooses not to provide rotating x labels, as it is bad dataviz practice.
